channel.title: Error for skilled coders
channel.description:
yes , im making prays but I always get this error cause I dont want to make voids like a newb
code: [code] } else if (Smite == true) { //Smite range Prayer -= (divide)((divide)(Hitdiff) / 3)); } else if (p2.ProtRange == true && rangeAttacking == 1) { //Prot range hitDiff -= (divide)((divide)(Maxhit) / 1.5));[/code]
ints: [code] divide hitDiff = Maxhit / 0; int Prayer = playerLevel[5];//Prayer[/code]
error: [code]client.java:14970: ';' expected Prayer -= (divide)((divide)(Hitdiff) / 3)); ^ client.java:14972: ';' expected hitDiff -= (divide)((divide)(Maxhit) / 1.5)); ^ 2 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . . [/code]

item.title: Error for skilled coders
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

I’m pretty sure divide isn’t a data type.

Read full topic

item.description:

Try something more like of

hitDir -= Maxhist / 1.5;

try multiplying by 0.35 or a number that u would like… " *0.35);

item.title: Error for skilled coders
item.dc:creator: @Java_Geek Java Geek
item.description:
@Java_Geek wrote:

yes , im making prays but I always get this error cause I dont want to make voids like a newb

code:

} else if (Smite == true) { //Smite range Prayer -= (divide)((divide)(Hitdiff) / 3)); } else if (p2.ProtRange == true && rangeAttacking == 1) { //Prot range hitDiff -= (divide)((divide)(Maxhit) / 1.5));

ints:

		divide hitDiff = Maxhit / 0;
		int Prayer = playerLevel[5];//Prayer[/code]

error:
[code]client.java:14970: ';' expected
                            Prayer -= (divide)((divide)(Hitdiff) / 3));
                                                                     ^
client.java:14972: ';' expected
                            hitDiff -= (divide)((divide)(Maxhit) / 1.5));
                                                                       ^
2 errors
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

Read full topic
